name: Tenebris (itch)
description:
Defend your darkness from the light-bringing eyes! Smash them all!!!

A dark, gameboy-themed top-down arcade masher.

(oh. I forgot to make an actual highscore system. Means... The highscore will last only for one session ^^)

(btw, my personal highscore is 32 ^-^ )

Made for Game Boy Jam 5

All sprites made with Monochrome Spriter by JVKetchup
